text: Yudaya no (hō ni shitagau)-sha ni wa, ware wa subete no tsume no aru dōbutsu o kinji, mata ushi to hitsuji wa, sono abura o kinjita. Tada se to naizō ni fuchaku shi, matawa hone ni tsuranatta abura wa,-betsudearu. Kore wa, kare-ra no fusei kōi ni taisuru ōhō de, ware wa hontōni shinjitsudearu
